title: Human Oversight is Essential
description: Always review, test, and scan AI-generated code to maintain quality and security. Treat AI like a junior developer who needs supervision.

title: Guide AI with Clear Prompts & Context
description: Provide coding standards, project context, and detailed instructions to ensure useful and relevant AI-generated code. Document AI contributions for transparency.

title: Keep Developers Actively Engaged
description: To prevent skill atrophy, engineers should analyze, refactor, and fully understand AI-generated code instead of blindly accepting it.

title: Update Agile & DevOps Workflows
description: Modify sprint planning to include AI code validation. Enhance CI/CD pipelines with static analysis, security checks, and license compliance.

title: Define AI Usage Guidelines
description: Set company-wide rules for privacy, security, and ethical AI use. Train teams in prompt engineering and responsible AI-assisted coding.

title: Balance Speed with Control
description: AI accelerates development, but human oversight is key. Use AI to enhance efficiency while ensuring maintainability, security, and high-quality design.
